column1:
Odeinoichus,"2016-12-21T16:11:51.77Z","Fun Polybag with Good Model","

Set #30304 The Avengers Quinjet: Another polybag from 2015 this fun mini model is a second attempt of the Quinjet in this scale and it looks great. It’s also got some decent design elements that work in capturing the likeness of this vehicle. I really enjoy the look of it and feel that it’s a great little set and here’s why.

column2: Model is relatively quick to build and offers a great vehicle design in miniature scale, includes decent uses of parts and colours to capture the likeness fairly well.
Two flick-fire missiles are included for play features that situate under the wings and are very nicely tucked away so as not to detract from the look of the model.
Wings and cockpit can be angled however you’d like.
No printed markings to indicate the Avengers or SHIELD logo.

column1: I recommend this set for fans of Super Hero polybags and the Quinjet model in general because this is a really nice polybag. The price wasn’t too bad either for what it was, though it is somewhat difficult to find these days.
